verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy Is the Lord God Almighty Who was, and is, and is to come With all creation I sing: Praise to the King of Kings! You are my everything, And I will adore You!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
